heading.content: The best part of school true/false

content.body:
Tiick true or false

  • She dreams of the beaches in Spain. True / false
  • The Niagara Falls are in America. True / false
  • Last year they went to Spain by plane. True / false
  • They stopped for a meal on the way. True / false
  • They didn't want to share a picnic table. True / false
  • This summer they went to France. True / false
  • They stayed at an appartment. True / false
  • cabbage is a vegetable. True/ false
  • The ice creams in Holland are better than in France. True/ false
  • The appartment was close to the sea. True/ false
  • There are cars in Venice. True / false
  • I didn't speak to her friends during the holidays. True / false
